description: The magical egg pulses with a dimmer aura, suggesting it needs magical nourishment. What will you do?

choices.text: Channel your mana into the egg

description: The egg's aura flickers with vibrant energy, as if eager to interact with your magic. What's your move?

choices.text: Let it rest in a magical stasis field

description: The egg's magical resonance seems weak and fluctuating. What do you decide?

choices.text: Create a protective magical barrier for rest

description: The egg's surface patterns seem to need magical realignment. What's your choice?

choices.text: Cast a cleansing and alignment spell
